Operating income before depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) as a percentage of revenues / First quartile / Non-financial listed groups / Germany / Groups with a focus on the services sector / Profitability

General: Non-financial groups listed in Germany, which publish IFRS consolidated financial statements on a quarterly basis and make a noteworthy contribution to value added in Germany. Quantile data are based on unweighted return on sales of the groups. Excluding groups in real estate activities.
